example[0]: She lay in bed, too feverish to sleep.
example[1]: There was a feverish blush to his cheeks.
definition[1]: very excited or worried about something
example[2]: They waited in a state of feverish anxiety for their mother to come home.
example[3]: The show was about to begin and backstage there were signs of feverish activity  (=activity that is done very quickly because there is not much time).
